item.title: Getting started with the Academic framework for Hugo
item.description:
The Academic framework enables you to easily create a beautifully simple personal or academic website using the Hugo static site generator.

Key features:

SHRP 2 Implementation Assistance Program

Concept to Countermeasure â€“ Research to Deployment Using the SHRP2 Safety Data (NDS) Influence of Roadway Design Features on Episodic Speeding in Washington State

My responsibilities in this project includes

  • Data reduction for GPS/RID data
  • Data visualization
  • Exprolatory analysis
  • Statistical anlysis to investigate relationships between roadway characteristics and speeding behavior
